name: Add new contact to the contact list
scenarioId: classpath:features/contact_list_management:Add new contact to the contact list
methodName: Add new contact to the contact list

testSteps.description: 1: Add new contact to the contact list ({firstName=John, lastName=Doe, dob=1990-05-15, email=johndoe@email.com, phone=34367899090, address1=123 Main St, address2=, city=Austin, stateOrProvince=Texas, postalCode=73301, country=United States})

children.description: Given I am on the contact list page
When I click on the "Add a New Contact" button

And I fill in the following contact details:
| First Name | Last Name | Date of Birth | Email | Phone | Street Address 1 | Street Address 2 | City | State or Province | Postal Code | Country |
| John | Doe | 1990-05-15 | johndoe@email.com | 34367899090 | 123 Main St |  | Austin | Texas | 73301 | United States |
And I click on the "Submit" button to add a contact
Then I should see added contact in the contact list
